                    return { eligible: false, reason: "Valid security audit required" }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31.

                if reqs[:manual_review]

    33.

      34.

                { eligible: true }

              def issue_certification(cert_type, level)

            class ClaimVerificationService

              def initialize(claim)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                @claim = claim
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @agent = claim.agent

    5.

      6.

      7.

              def verify
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                result = case @claim.verification_method
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                when "dns_txt" then verify_dns
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                when "github_file" then verify_github
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                when "api_key" then verify_api_key
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                else false
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14.

              def verify_dns

    21. 
            

            

                domain = extract_domain(@agent.repo_url)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                return false unless domain
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                expected_token = @claim.verification_data["token"]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # Check DNS TXT record
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                begin
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  records = Resolv::DNS.open { |dns| dns.getresources("_evaled.#{domain}", Resolv::DNS::Resource::IN::TXT) }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29.

              def verify_github
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                owner, repo = parse_github_url(@agent.repo_url)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                return false unless owner && repo
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                expected_token = @claim.verification_data["token"]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                client = GithubClient.new
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                begin
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  content = client.contents(owner, repo, ".evaled/verify.txt")
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  return false unless content&.dig("content")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  decoded = Base64.decode64(content["content"])
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47.

              def extract_domain(url)

              def parse_github_url(url)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                match = url.match(%r{github\.com/([^/]+)/([^/]+)})
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                return nil unless match
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68.

      69.

              def get(path, params = {})

    39.

      41.

    46.

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            class RecommendationEngine
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def self.recommend_for_capability(capability, limit: 5)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                new.recommend_for_capability(capability, limit: limit)
          
      6.

              end
          
      7.

              def self.find_similar_agents(agent)

                new.find_similar_agents(agent)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10.

      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def recommend_for_capability(capability, limit: 5)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                return [] if capability.blank?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                Agent.published
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                     .by_category(capability)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                     .order(score: :desc)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                     .limit(limit)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                     .map { |a| recommendation_data(a, capability) }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              def find_similar_agents(agent, limit: 5)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                return [] if agent.nil?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Find agents with overlapping categories and similar scores
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                similar = Agent.published
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                               .where.not(id: agent.id)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                               .where("categories && ARRAY[?]::varchar[]", agent.categories.to_a)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                               .order(Arel.sql("ABS(score - #{agent.score.to_i})"))
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                               .limit(limit)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                similar.map { |a| similarity_data(a, agent) }
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              private
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              def recommendation_data(agent, capability)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  slug: agent.slug,
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  name: agent.name,
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  provider: agent.provider,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  score: agent.score,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  tier: agent.tier,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  match_reason: "Top performer for #{capability}",
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  categories: agent.categories
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def similarity_data(similar_agent, reference_agent)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                shared = (similar_agent.categories.to_a & reference_agent.categories.to_a)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                {
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  slug: similar_agent.slug,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  name: similar_agent.name,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  provider: similar_agent.provider,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  score: similar_agent.score,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  tier: similar_agent.tier,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  shared_categories: shared,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  score_difference: (similar_agent.score - reference_agent.score).round(1)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                }
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            end
          
      63.

    app/services/score_decay_calculator.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    42 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 42 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            # Calculates decayed scores based on time elapsed since evaluation.
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Scores decay exponentially based on the configured decay rate.
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            class ScoreDecayCalculator
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Decay rate factors per day
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # These represent the daily retention rate (how much score is retained each day)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              DECAY_RATES = {
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                "slow" => 0.999,     # ~0.1% decay per day, ~3% per month
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                "standard" => 0.995, # ~0.5% decay per day, ~14% per month
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                "fast" => 0.990      # ~1% decay per day, ~26% per month
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              }.freeze
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              # Default decay rate if not specified
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              DEFAULT_RATE = "standard"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              class << self
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Calculates the current decayed score for an agent score
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                #
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # @param agent_score [AgentScore] The agent score record
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # @return [Float] The decayed score value
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                def calculate_current_score(agent_score)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  return agent_score.overall_score if agent_score.score_at_eval.blank?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  base_score = agent_score.score_at_eval.to_f
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  days_elapsed = days_since_eval(agent_score)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  rate_factor = decay_rate_factor(agent_score.decay_rate)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  # Apply exponential decay: score = base_score * (rate ^ days)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  decayed = base_score * (rate_factor**days_elapsed)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Clamp to valid range [0, 100]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  decayed.clamp(0.0, 100.0).round(2)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Returns the decay rate factor for a given rate name
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                #
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # @param rate [String] The decay rate name (slow, standard, fast)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # @return [Float] The daily retention factor
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                def decay_rate_factor(rate)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  DECAY_RATES[rate.to_s] || DECAY_RATES[DEFAULT_RATE]
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # Calculates the percentage of original score remaining
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                #
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # @param agent_score [AgentScore] The agent score record
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                # @return [Float] Percentage of original score (0-100)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                def score_retention_percentage(agent_score)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  return 100.0 if agent_score.score_at_eval.blank? || agent_score.score_at_eval.zero?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  current = calculate_current_score(agent_score)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  ((current / agent_score.score_at_eval.to_f) * 100).round(2)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # Estimates when the score will drop below a threshold
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                #
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # @param agent_score [AgentScore] The agent score record
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # @param threshold [Float] The score threshold (default: 70.0)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                # @return [DateTime, nil] Estimated date or nil if already below threshold
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                def estimated_threshold_date(agent_score, threshold: 70.0)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  return nil if agent_score.score_at_eval.blank?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  base_score = agent_score.score_at_eval.to_f
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  return nil if base_score <= threshold
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  rate_factor = decay_rate_factor(agent_score.decay_rate)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  reference_date = agent_score.last_verified_at || agent_score.evaluated_at
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  return nil if reference_date.blank?
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Solve for days: threshold = base_score * (rate ^ days)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  # days = log(threshold / base_score) / log(rate)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  days_to_threshold = Math.log(threshold / base_score) / Math.log(rate_factor)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  reference_date + days_to_threshold.days
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                private
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                def days_since_eval(agent_score)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  reference_date = agent_score.last_verified_at || agent_score.evaluated_at
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  return 0 if reference_date.blank?
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  ((Time.current - reference_date) / 1.day).to_f.clamp(0, Float::INFINITY)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            end
          
      88.

              CHECKS = [

                { name: "prompt_injection", severity: "critical" },

              def run_automated_audit
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                findings = CHECKS.map do |check|
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  result = run_check(check[:name])
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  {
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    check: check[:name],
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    severity: check[:severity],
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    passed: result[:passed],
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

      25.

      26.

                severity_summary = summarize_severities(findings)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                passed = findings.none? { |f| !f[:passed] && %w[critical high].include?(f[:severity]) }
          
      30.

      42.

              private

              def run_check(check_name)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                case check_name
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                when "prompt_injection"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  result = Tier2::PromptInjectionTester.new(@agent).test
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  { passed: result[:resistance_score] >= 90, details: result }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                when "jailbreak_resistance"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  result = Tier2::JailbreakTester.new(@agent).test
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  { passed: result[:resistance_score] >= 90, details: result }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  { passed: true, details: "Check not implemented" }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def summarize_severities(findings)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                failed = findings.reject { |f| f[:passed] }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                SecurityAudit::SEVERITIES.to_h do |sev|
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  [ sev, failed.count { |f| f[:severity] == sev } ]
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            end
          
      65.

    app/services/tier0/bus_factor_analyzer.rb

              class BusFactorAnalyzer

                def initialize(agent)

    4. 
            

            

                  @agent = agent
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  @client = GithubClient.new
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  parse_repo_url
          
      7.

      8.

                def analyze
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  contributors = fetch_contributors
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  return { score: 0, active_contributors: 0 } if contributors.empty?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12.

                  {
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    active_contributors: contributors.count,

    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                private
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                def fetch_contributors
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  @client.contributors(@owner, @repo).first(100) rescue []
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                def calculate_top_contributor_pct(contributors)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  return 100.0 if contributors.count == 1
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  total = contributors.sum { |c| c["contributions"] }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  top = contributors.first["contributions"]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  (top.to_f / total * 100).round(1)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                def estimate_bus_factor(contributors)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # How many contributors make up 80% of commits?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  total = contributors.sum { |c| c["contributions"] }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  threshold = total * 0.8
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  running = 0
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  contributors.each_with_index do |c, i|
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    running += c["contributions"]
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    return i + 1 if running >= threshold
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  contributors.count
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                def calculate_score(contributors)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  count_score = case contributors.count
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  when 5.. then 100
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  when 3..4 then 70
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  when 2 then 40
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  else 20
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  # Penalty if top contributor > 80%
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  top_pct = calculate_top_contributor_pct(contributors)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  penalty = top_pct > 80 ? 20 : 0
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  [ count_score - penalty, 0 ].max
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60.

              class DependencyRiskAnalyzer

                def check_lockfile
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  lockfiles = %w[package-lock.json yarn.lock Gemfile.lock go.sum Cargo.lock]
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  lockfiles.any? { |f| @client.contents(@owner, @repo, f).present? }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                def count_dependencies
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  PACKAGE_FILES.sum do |file|
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    content = @client.contents(@owner, @repo, file)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    next 0 unless content
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    estimate_dep_count(file, content)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                def estimate_dep_count(file, content)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless content["content"]
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  decoded = Base64.decode64(content["content"])
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  case file
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  when "package.json"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    json = JSON.parse(decoded) rescue {}
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    (json["dependencies"]&.count || 0) + (json["devDependencies"]&.count || 0)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  when "Gemfile"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    decoded.scan(/^\s*gem\s+/).count
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  when "requirements.txt"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    decoded.lines.count { |l| l.strip.present? && !l.start_with?("#") }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  else
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    0
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                def fetch_security_alerts
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  alerts = @client.dependabot_alerts(@owner, @repo)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  return 0 unless alerts.is_a?(Array)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  alerts.count { |a| a["state"] == "open" }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                def calculate_score
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  alerts = fetch_security_alerts
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  has_lock = check_lockfile
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  base = 100
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  base -= alerts * 15  # -15 per open alert
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  base -= 20 unless has_lock  # -20 for no lockfile
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  [ base, 0 ].max
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                def parse_repo_url
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  match = @agent.repo_url.match(%r{github\.com/([^/]+)/([^/]+)})
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  @owner, @repo = match[1], match[2].sub(/\.git$/, "") if match
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            end

                def analyze

                  readme = fetch_readme

                  {
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    readme_length: readme&.length || 0,
          
      16.

                    has_badges: readme&.include?("![") || false,

                def fetch_readme
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  %w[README.md readme.md README.rst README].each do |name|
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    content = @client.contents(@owner, @repo, name)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    next unless content&.dig("content")
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    return Base64.decode64(content["content"])
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  nil

    35. 
            

            

                end

                def detect_sections(readme)

                  false

                  content = @client.contents(@owner, @repo, path)

                  content.is_a?(Array)

    51. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      52.

                  false

                def calculate_score(readme)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  score = 0
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  # README quality (max 40)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  if readme
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    score += 10 if readme.length > 500
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    score += 10 if readme.length > 2000
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    score += 10 if readme.include?("![")  # badges
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    score += 10 if detect_sections(readme).count >= 3
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  # Standard files (max 30)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  score += 10 if file_exists?("CHANGELOG.md") || file_exists?("HISTORY.md")
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  score += 10 if file_exists?("CONTRIBUTING.md")
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  score += 10 if file_exists?("LICENSE") || file_exists?("LICENSE.md")
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Docs (max 30)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  score += 15 if folder_exists?("docs")
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  score += 15 if folder_exists?("examples")
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  [ score, 100 ].min
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                def parse_repo_url
          
      79.

            module Tier0

              class RepoHealthAnalyzer
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                def initialize(agent)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  @agent = agent
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  @client = GithubClient.new

                  parse_repo_url

      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                def analyze
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  {
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    commit_recency: analyze_commit_recency,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    commit_frequency: analyze_commit_frequency,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

    15. 
            

            

                  }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                private
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                def analyze_commit_recency
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  commits = @client.commits(@owner, @repo)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  return 0 if commits.empty? || commits.is_a?(Hash)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  last_commit = Time.parse(commits.first.dig("commit", "committer", "date"))
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  days_ago = (Time.current - last_commit) / 1.day
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  case days_ago
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  when 0..7 then 100
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  when 8..30 then 80
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  when 31..90 then 50
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  else 20
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                def analyze_commit_frequency
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  commits = @client.commits(@owner, @repo)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  return 0 if commits.empty? || commits.is_a?(Hash)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # Score based on commits in last 6 months
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  commit_count = commits.size
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  case commit_count
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  when 100.. then 100
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  when 50..99 then 80
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  when 20..49 then 60
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  when 5..19 then 40
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  else 20
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                def analyze_issue_ratio
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  issues = @client.issues(@owner, @repo)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  return 100 if issues.empty? || issues.is_a?(Hash)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  open_issues = issues.count { |i| i["state"] == "open" }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  closed_issues = issues.count { |i| i["state"] == "closed" }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  total = open_issues + closed_issues
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  return 100 if total.zero?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # Higher score for better close ratio
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  close_ratio = closed_issues.to_f / total
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  (close_ratio * 100).round
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                def calculate_score
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  recency = analyze_commit_recency
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  frequency = analyze_commit_frequency
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  issues = analyze_issue_ratio
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Weighted average: recency 40%, frequency 30%, issues 30%
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  ((recency * 0.4) + (frequency * 0.3) + (issues * 0.3)).round
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                def parse_repo_url
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  match = @agent.repo_url.match(%r{github\.com/([^/]+)/([^/]+)})
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  @owner, @repo = match[1], match[2].sub(/\.git$/, "") if match
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            end
          
      81.

    app/services/tier0/scoring_engine.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            module Tier0
          
      2.

              class ScoringEngine
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                WEIGHTS = {
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  repo_health: 0.30,
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  bus_factor: 0.20,
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  dependency_risk: 0.25,
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  documentation: 0.25
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                }.freeze
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                EXPIRY_DAYS = 30
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                def initialize(agent)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  @agent = agent
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                def evaluate
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  breakdown = {
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    repo_health: RepoHealthAnalyzer.new(@agent).analyze,
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    bus_factor: BusFactorAnalyzer.new(@agent).analyze,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    dependency_risk: DependencyRiskAnalyzer.new(@agent).analyze,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    documentation: DocumentationAnalyzer.new(@agent).analyze
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  overall = calculate_weighted_score(breakdown)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  AgentScore.create!(
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    agent: @agent,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    tier: 0,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    overall_score: overall,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    breakdown: breakdown,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    evaluated_at: Time.current,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    expires_at: EXPIRY_DAYS.days.from_now
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  )
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                private
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                def calculate_weighted_score(breakdown)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  WEIGHTS.sum do |key, weight|
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    (breakdown.dig(key, :score) || 0) * weight
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  end.round
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            end
          
      45.

            module Tier1

              # CodingEvalHarness evaluates coding agents by running them against
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # standardized coding tasks in isolated sandbox environments.
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              #
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # The harness:
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # 1. Sets up an isolated sandbox environment
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # 2. Loads the initial code state for the task
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              # 3. Runs the agent with the task prompt
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # 4. Applies the agent's code changes
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              # 5. Runs the test suite
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              # 6. Returns comprehensive metrics
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              #
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              class CodingEvalHarness

                class SandboxError < StandardError; end

                # Main entry point - runs the full evaluation pipeline
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                #
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # @return [Result] evaluation results with metrics
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                def run
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  @start_time = Process.clock_gettime(Process::CLOCK_MONOTONIC)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50.

                  agent_output = run_agent
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  apply_agent_changes(agent_output)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  test_results = run_tests
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56.

                  build_result(
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    completed: true,

    61. 
            

            

                  )
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                rescue SandboxError, AgentError, TestError => e
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  build_result(completed: false, error: e.message)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      65.

                  Rails.logger.error("[CodingEvalHarness] Unexpected error: #{e.class} - #{e.message}")
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error(e.backtrace.first(10).join("\n"))
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  build_result(completed: false, error: "Unexpected error: #{e.message}")
          
      68.

                ensure

                # Sets up an isolated sandbox directory for the evaluation

                def setup_sandbox

    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78.

                # Loads the initial code state from the task into the sandbox

      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  end

      94.

                  # Copy test files if specified

                    end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103.

      104.

                end
          
      107.

                # Runs the agent with the task prompt and captures output
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                #

    110. 
            

            

                # @return [String] the agent's response/code changes
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                def run_agent
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  prompt = build_agent_prompt
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  response = execute_agent_request(prompt)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  unless response[:success]
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    raise AgentError, "Agent failed to respond: #{response[:error]}"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119.

                  response[:output]
